comment: The set of elements ` s ` determining classes ` C ` (which may depend on ` s ` ) containing a special element and the set of elements ` s ` determining classes ` C ` not containing the special element are disjoint. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 9-Nov-2020.) (Revised by AV, 17-Dec-2021.)
